title: Content Workflow SOP Builder – Weekly Plan, Zero Scramble

steps.title: Intake
steps.desc: Gather your goals, audience, platforms and tools.

steps.title: Map & Draft
steps.desc: Outline ideation, drafting, editing and publishing; insert AI prompts and the content calendar.

steps.title: Checklist & QA
steps.desc: Create a one‑page Quick‑Start and the 1→10 Repurpose Matrix; refine for clarity.

steps.title: Review & Finalize
steps.desc: You review; I apply one focused revision and deliver.

faqs.q: Will this work if I don’t have topics yet?
faqs.a: Yes. Together we’ll outline a calendar, and you can fill topics later as you plan.
It works with blogs, newsletters, LinkedIn and other platforms; you supply the details.
One round for clarity and usability; major scope or strategy changes aren’t included.

requirements: 2–3 sentences on your content goal and audience
Tools and platforms you use (e.g., ChatGPT, Google Docs, social channels)
(Optional) Example content piece or topic to optimize
